targets.rawSql:
SELECT *
FROM (
      SELECT 'LogServer' AS name, median(value) as median, 1 as sort_order
      FROM (
            SELECT dateDiff(microsecond, sl.timestamp_in, slt.event_timestamp) AS value
            FROM server_logs sl
            INNER JOIN server_logs_timestamps slt ON sl.message_id = slt.message_id
            WHERE slt.event = 'timestamp_out' AND
                  sl.timestamp_in >= $__fromTime AND slt.event_timestamp <= $__toTime
      )

      UNION ALL

      SELECT 'LogCollection' AS name, median(value) as median, 2 as sort_order
      FROM (
            SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) as value
            FROM logline_timestamps lt1
            INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
            WHERE lt1.status = 'in_process' AND lt2.status = 'finished' AND
                  lt1.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND lt2.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND
                  lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
      )

      UNION ALL

      SELECT 'BatchHandler' AS name, median(value) as median, 3 as sort_order
      FROM (
            SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) AS value
            FROM logline_timestamps lt1
            INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
            WHERE lt1.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt1.status = 'in_process' AND
                  lt2.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt2.status = 'batched' AND
                  lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
      )

      UNION ALL

      SELECT 'Prefilter' AS name, median(value) as median, 4 as sort_order
      FROM (
            SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) as value
            FROM batch_timestamps bt1
            INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
            WHERE bt1.status = 'in_process' AND bt2.status = 'finished' AND
                  bt1.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND bt2.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND
                  bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
      )

      UNION ALL

      SELECT 'Inspector' AS name, median(value) as median, 5 as sort_order
      FROM (
            SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) AS value
            FROM batch_timestamps bt1
            INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
            WHERE bt1.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt1.status = 'in_process' AND
                  bt2.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt2.is_active = False AND
                  bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime

            UNION ALL

            SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', bt.timestamp, sbt.timestamp) AS value
            FROM batch_timestamps bt
            INNER JOIN suspicious_batches_to_batch sbtb ON bt.batch_id = sbtb.batch_id
            INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt ON sbtb.suspicious_batch_id = sbt.suspicious_batch_id
            WHERE bt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt.status = 'in_process' AND
                  sbt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND sbt.status = 'finished' AND
                  bt.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt.timestamp <= $__toTime
      )

      UNION ALL

      SELECT 'Detector' AS name, median(value) as median, 6 as sort_order
      FROM (
            SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', sbt1.timestamp, sbt2.timestamp) AS value
            FROM suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt1
            INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt2 ON sbt1.suspicious_batch_id = sbt2.suspicious_batch_id
            WHERE sbt1.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt1.status = 'in_process' AND
                  sbt2.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt2.is_active = False AND
                  sbt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
      )
)

ORDER BY sort_order ASC;

SELECT
      'Median Latency' AS value,
      (
            SELECT median(value) FROM (
                  SELECT dateDiff(microsecond, sl.timestamp_in, slt.event_timestamp) AS value
                  FROM server_logs sl
                  INNER JOIN server_logs_timestamps slt ON sl.message_id = slt.message_id
                  WHERE slt.event = 'timestamp_out' AND
                        sl.timestamp_in >= $__fromTime AND slt.event_timestamp <= $__toTime
            )
      ) AS "LogServer",
      (
            SELECT median(value) FROM (
                  SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) as value
                  FROM logline_timestamps lt1
                  INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
                  WHERE lt1.status = 'in_process' AND lt2.status = 'finished' AND
                        lt1.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND lt2.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND
                        lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
            )
      ) AS "LogCollector",
      (
            SELECT median(value) FROM (
                  SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) AS value
                  FROM logline_timestamps lt1
                  INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
                  WHERE lt1.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt1.status = 'in_process' AND
                        lt2.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt2.status = 'batched' AND
                        lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
            )
      ) AS "BatchHandler",
      (
            SELECT median(value) FROM (
                  SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) as value
                  FROM batch_timestamps bt1
                  INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
                  WHERE bt1.status = 'in_process' AND bt2.status = 'finished' AND
                        bt1.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND bt2.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND
                        bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
            )
      ) AS "Prefilter",
      (
            SELECT median(value) FROM (
                  SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) AS value
                  FROM batch_timestamps bt1
                  INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
                  WHERE bt1.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt1.status = 'in_process' AND
                        bt2.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt2.is_active = False AND
                        bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime

                  UNION ALL

                  SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', bt.timestamp, sbt.timestamp) AS value
                  FROM batch_timestamps bt
                  INNER JOIN suspicious_batches_to_batch sbtb ON bt.batch_id = sbtb.batch_id
                  INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt ON sbtb.suspicious_batch_id = sbt.suspicious_batch_id
                  WHERE bt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt.status = 'in_process' AND
                        sbt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND sbt.status = 'finished' AND
                        bt.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt.timestamp <= $__toTime
            )
      ) AS "Inspector",
      (
            SELECT median(value) FROM (
                  SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', sbt1.timestamp, sbt2.timestamp) AS value
                  FROM suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt1
                  INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt2 ON sbt1.suspicious_batch_id = sbt2.suspicious_batch_id
                  WHERE sbt1.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt1.status = 'in_process' AND
                        sbt2.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt2.is_active = False AND
                        sbt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
            )
      ) AS "Detector"

SELECT *
FROM (
      SELECT 'Data Preparation Phase' AS name, sum(Median), 1 AS sort_order
      FROM (
            SELECT 'LogServer' AS name, median(value) AS "Median"
            FROM (
                  SELECT slt.event_timestamp AS time, dateDiff(microsecond, sl.timestamp_in, slt.event_timestamp) AS value
                  FROM server_logs sl
                  INNER JOIN server_logs_timestamps slt ON sl.message_id = slt.message_id
                  WHERE slt.event = 'timestamp_out' AND
                        sl.timestamp_in >= $__fromTime AND slt.event_timestamp <= $__toTime
            )

            UNION ALL

            SELECT 'LogCollector' AS name, median(value) AS "Median"
            FROM (
                  SELECT lt2.timestamp as time, dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) as value
                  FROM logline_timestamps lt1
                  INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
                  WHERE lt1.status = 'in_process' AND lt2.status = 'finished' AND
                        lt1.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND lt2.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND
                        lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
            )

            UNION ALL

            SELECT 'BatchHandler' AS name, median(value) AS "Median"
            FROM (
                  SELECT lt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) AS value
                  FROM logline_timestamps lt1
                  INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
                  WHERE lt1.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt1.status = 'in_process' AND
                        lt2.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt2.status = 'batched' AND
                        lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
            )

            UNION ALL

            SELECT 'Prefilter' AS name, median(value) AS "Median"
            FROM (
                  SELECT bt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) AS value
                  FROM batch_timestamps bt1
                  INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
                  WHERE bt1.status = 'in_process' AND bt2.status = 'finished' AND
                        bt1.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND bt2.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND
                        bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
            )
      )

      UNION ALL

      SELECT 'Analysis Phase' AS name, sum(Median), 2 AS sort_order
      FROM (
            SELECT 'Inspector' AS name, median(value) AS "Median"
            FROM (
                  SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) AS value
                  FROM batch_timestamps bt1
                  INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
                  WHERE bt1.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt1.status = 'in_process' AND
                        bt2.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt2.is_active = False AND
                        bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime

                  UNION ALL

                  SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', bt.timestamp, sbt.timestamp) AS value
                  FROM batch_timestamps bt
                  INNER JOIN suspicious_batches_to_batch sbtb ON bt.batch_id = sbtb.batch_id
                  INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt ON sbtb.suspicious_batch_id = sbt.suspicious_batch_id
                  WHERE bt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt.status = 'in_process' AND
                        sbt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND sbt.status = 'finished' AND
                        bt.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt.timestamp <= $__toTime
            )

            UNION ALL

            SELECT 'Detector' AS name, median(value) AS "Median"
            FROM (
                  SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', sbt1.timestamp, sbt2.timestamp) AS value
                  FROM suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt1
                  INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt2 ON sbt1.suspicious_batch_id = sbt2.suspicious_batch_id
                  WHERE sbt1.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt1.status = 'in_process' AND
                        sbt2.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt2.is_active = False AND
                        sbt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
            )
      )
)

ORDER BY sort_order ASC;

SELECT 'LogServer' AS name, median(value) AS " "
FROM (
      SELECT slt.event_timestamp AS time, dateDiff(microsecond, sl.timestamp_in, slt.event_timestamp) AS value
      FROM server_logs sl
      INNER JOIN server_logs_timestamps slt ON sl.message_id = slt.message_id
      WHERE slt.event = 'timestamp_out' AND
            sl.timestamp_in >= $__fromTime AND slt.event_timestamp <= $__toTime
)

UNION ALL

SELECT 'LogCollector' AS name, median(value) AS " "
FROM (
      SELECT lt2.timestamp as time, dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) as value
      FROM logline_timestamps lt1
      INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
      WHERE lt1.status = 'in_process' AND lt2.status = 'finished' AND
            lt1.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND lt2.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND
            lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

UNION ALL

SELECT 'BatchHandler' AS name, median(value) AS " "
FROM (
      SELECT lt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) AS value
      FROM logline_timestamps lt1
      INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
      WHERE lt1.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt1.status = 'in_process' AND
            lt2.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt2.status = 'batched' AND
            lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

UNION ALL

SELECT 'Prefilter' AS name, median(value) AS " "
FROM (
      SELECT bt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) AS value
      FROM batch_timestamps bt1
      INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
      WHERE bt1.status = 'in_process' AND bt2.status = 'finished' AND
            bt1.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND bt2.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND
            bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT 'Inspector' AS name, median(value) AS " "
FROM (
      SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) AS value
      FROM batch_timestamps bt1
      INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
      WHERE bt1.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt1.status = 'in_process' AND
            bt2.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt2.is_active = False AND
            bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime

      UNION ALL

      SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', bt.timestamp, sbt.timestamp) AS value
      FROM batch_timestamps bt
      INNER JOIN suspicious_batches_to_batch sbtb ON bt.batch_id = sbtb.batch_id
      INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt ON sbtb.suspicious_batch_id = sbt.suspicious_batch_id
      WHERE bt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt.status = 'in_process' AND
            sbt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND sbt.status = 'finished' AND
            bt.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt.timestamp <= $__toTime
      )

UNION ALL

SELECT 'Detector' AS name, median(value) AS " "
FROM (
      SELECT dateDiff('microsecond', sbt1.timestamp, sbt2.timestamp) AS value
      FROM suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt1
      INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt2 ON sbt1.suspicious_batch_id = sbt2.suspicious_batch_id
      WHERE sbt1.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt1.status = 'in_process' AND
            sbt2.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt2.is_active = False AND
            sbt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT slt.event_timestamp AS time, dateDiff(microsecond, sl.timestamp_in, slt.event_timestamp) AS value
FROM server_logs sl
INNER JOIN server_logs_timestamps slt ON sl.message_id = slt.message_id
WHERE slt.event = 'timestamp_out' AND
      sl.timestamp_in >= $__fromTime AND slt.event_timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(time) AS time_bucket,
    median(latency) AS value
FROM (
      SELECT slt.event_timestamp AS time, dateDiff(microsecond, sl.timestamp_in, slt.event_timestamp) AS latency
      FROM server_logs sl
      INNER JOIN server_logs_timestamps slt ON sl.message_id = slt.message_id
      WHERE slt.event = 'timestamp_out'
        AND sl.timestamp_in >= $__fromTime AND slt.event_timestamp <= $__toTime
)
GROUP BY time_bucket
ORDER BY time_bucket;

SELECT median(value) AS "Median"
FROM (
      SELECT slt.event_timestamp AS time, dateDiff(microsecond, sl.timestamp_in, slt.event_timestamp) AS value
      FROM server_logs sl
      INNER JOIN server_logs_timestamps slt ON sl.message_id = slt.message_id
      WHERE slt.event = 'timestamp_out' AND
            sl.timestamp_in >= $__fromTime AND slt.event_timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT bt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) AS value
FROM batch_timestamps bt1
INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
WHERE bt1.status = 'in_process' AND bt2.status = 'finished' AND
      bt1.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND bt2.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND
      bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(time) AS time_bucket,
    median(latency) AS value
FROM (
    SELECT bt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) AS latency
    FROM batch_timestamps bt1
    INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
    WHERE bt1.status = 'in_process' AND bt2.status = 'finished' AND
        bt1.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND bt2.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND
        bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)
GROUP BY time_bucket
ORDER BY time_bucket;

SELECT median(value) AS "Median"
FROM (
      SELECT bt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) AS value
      FROM batch_timestamps bt1
      INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
      WHERE bt1.status = 'in_process' AND bt2.status = 'finished' AND
            bt1.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND bt2.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND
            bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT min(value) AS "Minimum", avg(value) AS "Average", max(value) AS "Maximum"
FROM (
      SELECT slt.event_timestamp AS time, dateDiff(microsecond, sl.timestamp_in, slt.event_timestamp) AS value
      FROM server_logs sl
      INNER JOIN server_logs_timestamps slt ON sl.message_id = slt.message_id
      WHERE slt.event = 'timestamp_out' AND
            sl.timestamp_in >= $__fromTime AND slt.event_timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT min(value) AS "Minimum", avg(value) AS "Average", max(value) AS "Maximum"
FROM (
      SELECT bt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) AS value
      FROM batch_timestamps bt1
      INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
      WHERE bt1.status = 'in_process' AND bt2.status = 'finished' AND
            bt1.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND bt2.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND
            bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT lt2.timestamp as time, dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) as value
FROM logline_timestamps lt1
INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
WHERE lt1.status = 'in_process' AND lt2.status = 'finished' AND
      lt1.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND lt2.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND
      lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(time) AS time_bucket,
    median(latency) AS value
FROM (
      SELECT lt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) AS latency
      FROM logline_timestamps lt1
      INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
      WHERE lt1.status = 'in_process' AND lt2.status = 'finished' AND
            lt1.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND lt2.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND
            lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)
GROUP BY time_bucket
ORDER BY time_bucket;

SELECT median(value) AS "Median"
FROM (
      SELECT lt2.timestamp as time, dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) as value
      FROM logline_timestamps lt1
      INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
      WHERE lt1.status = 'in_process' AND lt2.status = 'finished' AND
            lt1.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND lt2.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND
            lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT bt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) AS value
FROM batch_timestamps bt1
INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
WHERE bt1.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt1.status = 'in_process' AND
      bt2.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt2.is_active = False AND
      bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY time ASC

UNION ALL

SELECT sbt.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', bt.timestamp, sbt.timestamp) AS value
FROM batch_timestamps bt
INNER JOIN suspicious_batches_to_batch sbtb ON bt.batch_id = sbtb.batch_id
INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt ON sbtb.suspicious_batch_id = sbt.suspicious_batch_id
WHERE bt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt.status = 'in_process' AND
      sbt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND sbt.status = 'finished' AND
      bt.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt.timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(time) AS time_bucket,
    median(latency) as value
FROM (
    SELECT bt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) AS latency
    FROM batch_timestamps bt1
    INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
    WHERE bt1.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt1.status = 'in_process' AND
        bt2.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt2.is_active = False AND
        bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
    ORDER BY time ASC

    UNION ALL

    SELECT sbt.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', bt.timestamp, sbt.timestamp) AS latency
    FROM batch_timestamps bt
    INNER JOIN suspicious_batches_to_batch sbtb ON bt.batch_id = sbtb.batch_id
    INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt ON sbtb.suspicious_batch_id = sbt.suspicious_batch_id
    WHERE bt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt.status = 'in_process' AND
        sbt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND sbt.status = 'finished' AND
        bt.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt.timestamp <= $__toTime
)
GROUP BY time_bucket
ORDER BY time_bucket;

SELECT median(value) AS "Median"
FROM (
      SELECT bt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) AS value
      FROM batch_timestamps bt1
      INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
      WHERE bt1.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt1.status = 'in_process' AND
            bt2.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt2.is_active = False AND
            bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime

      UNION ALL

      SELECT sbt.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', bt.timestamp, sbt.timestamp) AS value
      FROM batch_timestamps bt
      INNER JOIN suspicious_batches_to_batch sbtb ON bt.batch_id = sbtb.batch_id
      INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt ON sbtb.suspicious_batch_id = sbt.suspicious_batch_id
      WHERE bt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt.status = 'in_process' AND
            sbt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND sbt.status = 'finished' AND
            bt.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT min(value) AS "Minimum", avg(value) AS "Average", max(value) AS "Maximum"
FROM (
      SELECT lt2.timestamp as time, dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) as value
      FROM logline_timestamps lt1
      INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
      WHERE lt1.status = 'in_process' AND lt2.status = 'finished' AND
            lt1.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND lt2.stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND
            lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT min(value) AS "Minimum", avg(value) AS "Average", max(value) AS "Maximum"
FROM (
      SELECT bt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) AS value
      FROM batch_timestamps bt1
      INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2 ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
      WHERE bt1.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt1.status = 'in_process' AND
            bt2.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt2.is_active = False AND
            bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime

      UNION ALL

      SELECT sbt.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', bt.timestamp, sbt.timestamp) AS value
      FROM batch_timestamps bt
      INNER JOIN suspicious_batches_to_batch sbtb ON bt.batch_id = sbtb.batch_id
      INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt ON sbtb.suspicious_batch_id = sbt.suspicious_batch_id
      WHERE bt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt.status = 'in_process' AND
            sbt.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND sbt.status = 'finished' AND
            bt.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT lt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) AS value
FROM logline_timestamps lt1
INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
WHERE lt1.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt1.status = 'in_process' AND
      lt2.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt2.status = 'batched' AND
      lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(time) AS time_bucket,
    median(latency) as value
FROM (
    SELECT lt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) AS latency
    FROM logline_timestamps lt1
    INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
    WHERE lt1.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt1.status = 'in_process' AND
        lt2.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt2.status = 'batched' AND
        lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)
GROUP BY time_bucket
ORDER BY time_bucket;

SELECT median(value) AS "Median"
FROM (
      SELECT lt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) AS value
      FROM logline_timestamps lt1
      INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
      WHERE lt1.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt1.status = 'in_process' AND
            lt2.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt2.status = 'batched' AND
            lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT sbt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', sbt1.timestamp, sbt2.timestamp) AS value
FROM suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt1
INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt2 ON sbt1.suspicious_batch_id = sbt2.suspicious_batch_id
WHERE sbt1.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt1.status = 'in_process' AND
      sbt2.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt2.is_active = False AND
      sbt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(time) AS time_bucket,
    median(latency) AS value
FROM (
    SELECT sbt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', sbt1.timestamp, sbt2.timestamp) AS latency
    FROM suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt1
    INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt2 ON sbt1.suspicious_batch_id = sbt2.suspicious_batch_id
    WHERE sbt1.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt1.status = 'in_process' AND
        sbt2.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt2.is_active = False AND
        sbt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)
GROUP BY time_bucket
ORDER BY time_bucket;

SELECT median(value) AS "Median"
FROM (
      SELECT sbt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', sbt1.timestamp, sbt2.timestamp) AS value
      FROM suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt1
      INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt2 ON sbt1.suspicious_batch_id = sbt2.suspicious_batch_id
      WHERE sbt1.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt1.status = 'in_process' AND
            sbt2.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt2.is_active = False AND
            sbt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT min(value) AS "Minimum", avg(value) AS "Average", max(value) AS "Maximum"
FROM (
      SELECT lt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', lt1.timestamp, lt2.timestamp) AS value
      FROM logline_timestamps lt1
      INNER JOIN logline_timestamps lt2 ON lt1.logline_id = lt2.logline_id
      WHERE lt1.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt1.status = 'in_process' AND
            lt2.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND lt2.status = 'batched' AND
            lt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND lt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT min(value) AS "Minimum", avg(value) AS "Average", max(value) AS "Maximum"
FROM (
      SELECT sbt2.timestamp AS time, dateDiff('microsecond', sbt1.timestamp, sbt2.timestamp) AS value
      FROM suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt1
      INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps sbt2 ON sbt1.suspicious_batch_id = sbt2.suspicious_batch_id
      WHERE sbt1.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt1.status = 'in_process' AND
            sbt2.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND sbt2.is_active = False AND
            sbt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND sbt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT min(value) AS "Minimum", median(value) AS "Median", avg(value) AS "Average", max(value) AS "Maximum"
FROM (
  SELECT dateDiff('microseconds', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) as value
  FROM batch_timestamps bt1
  INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2
          ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
  WHERE bt1.stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND bt1.status = 'completed'
    AND bt2.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND bt2.status = 'in_process' AND
        bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT min(value) AS "Minimum", median(value) AS "Median", avg(value) AS "Average", max(value) AS "Maximum"
FROM (
  SELECT dateDiff('microseconds', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) as value
  FROM batch_timestamps bt1
  INNER JOIN batch_timestamps bt2
          ON bt1.batch_id = bt2.batch_id
  WHERE bt1.stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND bt1.status = 'finished'
    AND bt2.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt2.status = 'in_process' AND
        bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT min(value) AS "Minimum", median(value) AS "Median", avg(value) AS "Average", max(value) AS "Maximum"
FROM (
  SELECT dateDiff('microseconds', bt1.timestamp, bt2.timestamp) as value
  FROM suspicious_batch_timestamps bt1
  INNER JOIN suspicious_batch_timestamps bt2
          ON bt1.suspicious_batch_id = bt2.suspicious_batch_id
  WHERE bt1.stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND bt1.status = 'finished'
    AND bt2.stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND bt2.status = 'in_process' AND
        bt1.timestamp >= $__fromTime AND bt2.timestamp <= $__toTime
)

list.definition:
SELECT CASE 
    WHEN (dateDiff('minute', toDateTime($__fromTime), toDateTime($__toTime))) <= 5 THEN 'Second'
    WHEN (dateDiff('hour', toDateTime($__fromTime), toDateTime($__toTime))) <= 1 THEN 'Minute'
    WHEN (dateDiff('hour', toDateTime($__fromTime), toDateTime($__toTime))) <= 24 THEN 'Hour'
    ELSE 'Day'
END AS interval;
list.name: Granularity
list.query:
SELECT CASE 
    WHEN (dateDiff('minute', toDateTime($__fromTime), toDateTime($__toTime))) <= 5 THEN 'Second'
    WHEN (dateDiff('hour', toDateTime($__fromTime), toDateTime($__toTime))) <= 1 THEN 'Minute'
    WHEN (dateDiff('hour', toDateTime($__fromTime), toDateTime($__toTime))) <= 24 THEN 'Hour'
    ELSE 'Day'
END AS interval;

list.description: Select whether the wait time in the BatchHandler should be part of its latency.
list.label: BatchHandler
list.name: IncludeWaitTime
list.query: with wait time, without wait time
